# 恋爱教科书

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/lianai-jiaokeshu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/lianai-jiaokeshu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install lianai-jiaokeshu
lianai-jiaokeshu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g lianai-jiaokeshu
lianai-jiaokeshu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
